items.name: digital cash
items.description: Starting business capital in Bazaar Orbital credits converted to USD-equivalent for trade and supplies

items.name: propeller hat (reinforced)
items.description: Theatrical, armored propeller hats combining lightweight plating with vintage charm for simulation-prepper clientele

items.name: reinforced umbrella (armored frame)
items.description: Heavy-duty umbrellas with shock-dampening ribs and concealment pockets marketed as anti-simulation shelter gear

items.name: weatherproof raincoat (ceramic-weave)
items.description: Militaria-inspired raincoats using ceramic-weave panels for added protection and theatrical appeal at veterans' markets

items.name: Nuclear Energy Drink (ritual can)
items.description: Exotic ritual beverage sold as a novelty energy tonic with retro-war branding popular among simulation theorists

items.name: armoring supplies (light plating panels)
items.description: Raw lightweight plating used to reinforce hats and umbrellas for onsite customization

items.name: sewing & repair kit (industrial)
items.description: Heavy-duty sewing and rivet kits for in-market repairs and bespoke modifications to protective garments

items.name: theatrical sales session
items.description: One-hour sales demonstration / storytelling performance combining military anecdotes and product demonstration at fairs

items.name: veterans' provenance certificates (replica)
items.description: Decorative provenance cards and faux medals that accompany merchandise to appeal to collectors and nostalgia

items.name: portable market stall (modular display)
items.description: Foldable, branded stall units for Bazaar Orbital markets, optimized for theatrical presentation and quick assembly
